oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Farm Type and Land Use Variables for Alberta 2011 Census of Agriculture
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Statistics Canada
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This GIS data (polygon .shp file) is based upon variables in an excel spreadsheet that Michelle Edwards, Data Librarian, University of Guelph, edwardsm@uoguelph.ca put together for the 2011 Census of Agriculture. Only the data from the first sheet "FarmType_LandUse" has been included. The census consolidated subdivision (CCS) population totals for 1991, 1996, 2001, 2006, and 2011 have been appended. If you require the full excel spread sheet please contact Larry Laliberte GIS Librarian, University of Alberta Libraries.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Census of Agriculture
GIS
Alberta
